lines.text: I forget what we're doing tonight.
You're sacrificing a virgin to the rain god Mole.
We'll have to elect ourselves a new one.
Rain? Oh, yes, of course. Of course, rain. Isn't that little Ruth? Why are we sacrificing her?
She's the only virgin we could find on such short notice.
Even then it wouldn't be easy. They're very hard to find.
But I've known little Ruth since she was knee-high to a cricket.
We've sacrificed chickens, sheep, and bulls and they didn't work.

[after being told Sodom has been destroyed]
How did it happen?
God destroyed them for their wickedness.
